alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 24 at 3:53AM CST until December 25 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 below zero. * WHERE...In Alabama, Jackson and DeKalb counties. In Tennessee, Franklin county. Wind chill temperatures will be lowest in the higher elevations. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon CST today. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to 9 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate layered clothing, a hat, and gloves.
